title: @RIOT What do you think of Zed's 50% ban rate?
body:
I just want to know what RIOT thinks about Zed's constant 40/50% ban rate?

I personally don't think its very healthy for the game that a single champion consistently gets banned in half of all games, but thats just little old me.

So i just want to know, does riot think its perfectly fine? or are they going to do something about it?

Simple harmless question. please respond.

replies.body:
I think its to do with the fact that Zed is a difficult champion to deal with. I used to think it's more to do with how people don't know how to play against him, but the truth is, if the Zed is good he will always be in someway relevant and when Zed is relevant, he will kill squishy champions, he'll roam, in solo Queue it's hard to prevent this, that even if you stomp him he will find a way to catch up through either jumping into team fights to kill a target with lowered HP, or split pushing once mid game arrives.

I'm not calling Zed OP or broken
I personally never ban him. :-) That Qss change comming up though :-/...
Such a stupid change, as if he already didn't have enough counterplay.
i love zed so like it's a good thing for me :P
